HELP_IN_FINDING_NEW_LEVELS: I've added as many levels as I could find. I'd appreciate any help in finding the rest.
ASK_RESET_ALL_PROGRESS: Are you sure you want to reset all progress?
GAME_GOAL_INSTRUCTION: Your goal is to have <1>exactly one</1> <2 /> in each <3> row, column, and color region.</3>
TAPS_INSTRUCTION: Tap once to place X and tap twice for <1 />. Use X to mark where <2 /> cannot be placed.
TOUCH_DIAGONAL_QUEENS_INSTRUCTION: Two <1 /> cannot touch each other, not even diagonally.
PAST_IMAGE_MSG: Try pasting an image. The bigger and as specific the image, the better.
SHARE_LEVEL_SCREENSHOT_LINK: If you have a screenshot of the level, please share it <1>here</1> or reach out directly.
PAGE_YOU_ARE_LOOKING_FOR_DOESNT_EXIST: Oops! The page you’re looking for doesn’t exist.
COMMUNITY_LEVELS_DESCRIPTION: Create your own level for the community
LINKEDIN_LEVELS_DESCRIPTION: Clone levels from the original game
COMMUNITY_LEVEL_NOTE: Note: You can create <1>1 free level</1>. Want more? Check out the <4>level packs</4> on Patreon <6>here</6>.
DISCOVER_AND_BUILD_COMMUNITY_LEVELS: Discover unique levels created by the community! Play, get inspired, and build your own with the
TRY_RANDOMLY_GENERATED_LEVEL: Finished all of the community levels? Try a randomly generated one using the
GENERATE_LEVELS: Generate random levels. Choose the size and let the algorithm create a unique puzzle for you
TIMED_OUT: Timed out generating a {{size}}x{{size}} level, click the button to try again
SHARE_LINK_TO_LEVEL: Found a good level? Include a link when sharing.
FOUND_VALID_LEVEL: Found a valid level, attempting to improve difficulty for up to 90 seconds...
GENERATE_MAY_REQUIRE_MULTIPLE_ATTEMPTS: May require multiple attempts, please be patient
DRAG_TO_UNCHECK: Clear Xs by tapping and dragging starting on a square containing an X (matches LinkedIn behavior)
